page.title: 19EDUCATION THEN AND NOW.
page.content: We interviewed some people in the village who went to N.Ferriby school over 40 years ago.We compared their answers to see how school has changed from 1915 to now. N.Ferriby Primary school is on 3 sites,the Old school built in 1868,the Main school started in 1954 and the New school built in 1971.The New school houses 2 classes of reception and 5+children,the Old school 2 classes of 6-7year olds and the Main school 6 classes of juniors 7-11.In 1948 the school opened a canteen in the village hall catering for 60 school dinners,nowadays only 27 stay, but now children stay packed lunches, prior to the war only children from Melton or the High Rd.could stay at school to eat a packed lunch,everyone else had to go home.
